title: Can't use spells: Q, W, E, R, D, F, B and SPACE not working
body:
Hello guys,
recently i had 3 ranked games (not consecutive), where i couldnt use any of my spells and it drives me mad.
To activate my spells i have to click on them in the UI.
I can however press **enter** and type in chat, press **tab** to show the scoreboard, press **esc** to enter options: changing anything in the menu doenst help either. 
Switching keyboards from different brands, reconnecting, relogging and alt-tabbing...nothing changes.

I don't know what to do...anyone had the same problems occurring?
Desparetely need help.

Thanks in advance,
1God4Spirits

replies.body:
It sounds like your input settings file that's stored on the server could be corrupt. I'd like you to try a reset with the steps below. 

Log into the game then hop into a custom match. **Alt+Tab** out of the game, then navigate to your installation folder, which should be located in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

*Delete* the folder name **CONFIG**

Once you've deleted that folder, *Alt+Tab* back into the match and leave it. Hop into a new custom match to confirm the changes went through. Let me know if this worked!~
